Interface Job

All Superinterfaces:
Resource, Task
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseJob
public interface Job
extends Task

Method Detail

getJobType

public JobType getJobType()
Returns this job's type. This is a convenience method as it should return the same value as Task.getTaskType().

Returns:
The job type

getJobSpec

public JobSpec getJobSpec()
Returns this job's spec. This is a convenience method as it should return the same value as Task.getTaskSpec().

Returns:
The job spec

Returns this job's status.

public java.lang.String getJobSubmissionString()
Returns the job submission string that was used to submit the job to its job submission service.

Returns:
The job submission string

getJobId

public java.lang.String getJobId()
Returns the identifier assigned by the job submission service to this job. This is not to be confused with the object identifier.

Returns:
The job id
